channel.title: Rate this pure im botting? *UPDATE:1/13/10 read top of post for update*
channel.description:
Update 1/13/10: ok first off, i got grounded :( thats what happens when you tell you Mom to fuck off and tell you Dad to suck a dick and die on it :P second, this account has membership, so when i am botting im doing ess now, and i might not be posting often because im in love ;), best of luck to all mopar players :D
i have been autoing 15 hours a day for 4 days, switching back and forth from mining coal to killing cows. i have been using http://www.rsbot.org for my bots. i just want to know if the pure is off to a good start
Stats: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/t8td37.png[/img]
Account has over half a mil atm: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/qyaii8.png[/img]
updated 1/7/10: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/30i7q1k.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/14muzp5.png[/img]
update: 1/8/10 mostly i stayed up late and decided to leave it on, it logged me out an hour later, when i woke up i continued to auto for 2 hours [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1w5n5.png[/img]
1/9/10 [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2rxbdbn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/9savxg.png[/img]
1/10/10 i spent a long time botting and didn't get much melee done so yea [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2me8u9d.png[/img]
UPDATE: i will be botting melee monday-wed. and mining thurs-friday
NOTE: I will be changing npcs, outfits, bots, and skills. I am hoping doing this will make this account stay off jagex's radar, so i don't need to make a new pking pure.

item.title: Rate this pure im botting? *UPDATE:1/13/10 read top of post for update*
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

John459:

Lol you think I’m wrong. This was posted by autofighter, a much better company, they know what they’re talking about. If you knew about java you would know what that meant. Also, I’m not trying to flame I am just trying to keep people from being disappointed by lowering the risk of their account.

im downloading autofighter atm, ill probs take a look into it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rate this pure im botting? *UPDATE:1/13/10 read top of post for update*
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

[quote=“mylust4blood, post:47, topic:324371”]dude, you CAN’T! edit Jagex’s client, if you could runescape would be fucked up, so your just dumb, lastly this reflecting method, is called HACKING! by law Jagex cannot do that

Jesus so many haters[/quote]

??? rsbot is made of a reverse engineered runescape client, the group / site, downloads the jar with each update, packs it into the rsbot.jar that you download.

here is their svn
http://rsbotsvn.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/

here is the runescape.jar
http://rsbotsvn.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/lib/
direct link= http://rsbotsvn.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/lib/rs.jar

Read full topic

item.description:

item.source: Rate this pure im botting? *UPDATE:1/13/10 read top of post for update*

item.title: Rate this pure im botting? *UPDATE:1/13/10 read top of post for update*
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Do not use rsbot! Read this:

Botting systems use a method known in the programming world as BCEL. The BCEL method edits the actual code of the game client, therefore Jagex can easily use reflection methods to see that the code has been changed.

There is a site better than rsbot that does not use that, but I will not post it because that would be advertising.

Read full topic

item.title: Rate this pure im botting? *UPDATE:1/13/10 read top of post for update*
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

IceTICKER:

So, after i wait a year & i suddenly want to go on runescape on my old pure, will the account be unbanned & it will have all of his stats? or will it just reset & nothing is there, & there is no point waiting for a pure account thats gunna get unbanned.

In a year it’ll be un-banned and the offense will be cleared…

Same account and everything.

JaGeX isn’t that much of dicks.

Read full topic

item.title: Rate this pure im botting? *UPDATE:1/13/10 read top of post for update*
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:22, topic:324371"][quote author=mylust4blood link=topic=420769.msg3092437#msg3092437 date=1262996199]
ok i am betting u didn’t bot in 3 weeks, i sucided a wood cutter on vps, it did not stop till 99, it took over 3 weeks to get 94 wcing and gtfo, i wanted ppl to rate this, not show off there account that took years to make and btw censor ur username, iwon’t report (autoing pride) but we got noobs every were we go
[/quote]
As if I care if you believe me, I’m just saying. You did piss shit in that time… I got 1-56 wc in one night. Botted another 1 week of willows until around 79, did ivies till 94 in about 1 week and 2 days… (No stop)
I created this account on November 22th 09… No, I won’t gtfo, I also don’t care if you wanted people to rate this. I’m showing you up because I’m awesome and rsbot sucks cox. I spent actual money on my bots which gave me real results, rather than ‘crash every 20 minutes’ rsbot.org scripts… I can run these scripts for 20+ days without a crash.[/quote]
I’ve botted 1 week straight so far with RSBot. Everything is fine.

inb4 you’re gonna get banned

Read full topic

item.title: Rate this pure im botting? *UPDATE:1/13/10 read top of post for update*
item.dc:creator: @mylust4blood mylust4blood
item.description:
@mylust4blood wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:26, topic:324371”]I don’t really like your pure. You got 40 attack too early.

I’d rather have 20 attack and 70 strength rather than 40 attack and 50 strength. :D[/quote]
lol corrupt pures a good two, takes to long for me to make the money to get the weapon

[quote=“relmitos, post:27, topic:324371”]Keep it up

I’v earned a little over a milion today on a free server :o[/quote]
cool :P[quote=“Mitko, post:28, topic:324371”]Why are your fishing, smithing levels censored? Also your bank too.[/quote]
because these pics were also posted the same pics on rsbot, and jagex mods can see those stats and bank and find ur user that way

[quote=“Tribey, post:29, topic:324371”]It’s an okay start, but I think if you’re going to think seriously about botting this pure, you’re going to need to have a good bot.
I used to use rsbot constantly, but I now use Rsbots.net. I’ve managed to do 1-80 strength (P2P) in 1 week with it’s autofighter script, and I also did 1-70 hunter in 2 days, getting 1.8m in the process. They’re quite cheap if you think about it; hunter & autofighter both being around £10.

Think about it.[/quote]
im thiking about it :P[quote=“Explisionist, post:30, topic:324371”]I used rstrainers… I got lvl 1-75 wc in 3 days from botting 7 hours a day… I would get on for like an hour and sit at the g.e and fletch or talk to people… I never got banned for it. I botted 1-84 fming with them also… Still not banned… But rsbots got my lvl 76 str/range pure banned from their fishing bot…[/quote]
nice lol[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:31, topic:324371”]After a day of botting:
(I had to stop rsbot a few times)
[/quote]
nice job

IceTICKER:

i don’t get it, i hade a level 80 Pure ranger, i was botting the range, next thing you know i’m permanently banned, what do i say to jagex? this is my last appeal if i dont make this right then the offense is gonna be locked and i wont be able to get it unbanned.

well i have many methods of not getting banned such as switching npcs, switching skills, and only botting a certain parts of a day a humans could possibly do

Xx Weed Xx:

I rate, your pure 4/10, because the strenght and attack is low, you have 1 range, 1 mage, which is bad, get 70 mining, because that looks coolers :P. RSBOT = lazy shit runescape is a DIY job.

well im lazy and hate runescape, but i would rather cheat nd pk =\

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

B2300 T4nk:

5/10 Id say get range and mage.

Even though a majority of RSBot’s Ranging and Maging scripts fail hard?

I botted strength and attack using this bot:
http://www.autofighter.org/free.php?id=AutoCows&name=Free%20AutoCows%20NX

I also used an Autocurser getting 47 magic on f2p, spent like 400k, but it was all botted using summoning… (Might make a new account soon, as summoning looks stupid on a pure).

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:33, topic:324371”][quote author=IceTICKER link=topic=420769.msg3094036#msg3094036 date=1263133890]
i don’t get it, i hade a level 80 Pure ranger, i was botting the range, next thing you know i’m permanently banned, what do i say to jagex? this is my last appeal if i dont make this right then the offense is gonna be locked and i wont be able to get it unbanned.
[/quote]
If it gets denied,you have to wait 1 year to appeal it again :p[/quote]

No, you have to wait a month. It’s a year until it clears up.

Read full topic

item.title: Rate this pure im botting? *UPDATE:1/13/10 read top of post for update*
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

I used rstrainers… I got lvl 1-75 wc in 3 days from botting 7 hours a day… I would get on for like an hour and sit at the g.e and fletch or talk to people… I never got banned for it. I botted 1-84 fming with them also… Still not banned… But rsbots got my lvl 76 str/range pure banned from their fishing bot…

Read full topic
item.source: Rate this pure im botting? *UPDATE:1/13/10 read top of post for update*

item.title: Rate this pure im botting? *UPDATE:1/13/10 read top of post for update*
item.dc:creator: @boycie-tribey Tribey
item.description:
@boycie-tribey wrote:

It’s an okay start, but I think if you’re going to think seriously about botting this pure, you’re going to need to have a good bot.
I used to use rsbot constantly, but I now use Rsbots.net. I’ve managed to do 1-80 strength (P2P) in 1 week with it’s autofighter script, and I also did 1-70 hunter in 2 days, getting 1.8m in the process. They’re quite cheap if you think about it; hunter & autofighter both being around £10.

Think about it.

Read full topic
